prompt: Generate realistic text messages that represent non-spam (ham) content. These messages should reflect a broad spectrum of everyday communication, including personal conversations, legitimate business or service notifications, casual updates, and automated alerts. Vary the tone (friendly, professional, neutral, concerned), language style (informal chats, formal announcements, concise or detailed), and topics (meeting or appointment reminders, family or friend check-ins, order or delivery confirmations, bank transaction alerts, community or event updates). Include diverse formats like quick one-word replies, detailed explanations, friendly greetings, or automated system messages (e.g., OTP codes, subscription reminders). Ensure the content simulates authentic, non-malicious communication across different contexts, relationships, and platforms, avoiding any deceptive or promotional undertones.
response:
Hey! Just wanted to check in and see how your day is going.  
Reminder: Your dentist appointment is tomorrow at 2 PM.  
Got your package delivery! It will arrive by 5 PM today.  
Can you send me the notes from yesterday's meeting? Thanks!  
Congrats on your promotion! Let's celebrate this weekend!  
Your bank statement is ready to view online.  
Just a heads up, the community meeting is rescheduled for next Thursday.  
I'm running late, but I’ll be there in about 15 minutes.  
What time are we meeting for coffee tomorrow?  
Your OTP for logging in is 123456.  
Hope everything is okay, haven’t heard from you in a while.  
Please confirm your attendance at the workshop by Friday.  
Don't forget to bring the documents for the meeting next week.  
Just saw the new cafe opened downtown, want to check it out?  
Thanks for helping me with the project. I really appreciate it!  
Your subscription will renew on the 5th unless you cancel.  
Hey! Let’s do dinner next week. What day works for you?  
Your order has been shipped and should arrive by the end of the week.  
I’ll be out of the office tomorrow but reachable via email.  
Just checking in on how your mom is doing.  
The event starts at 6 PM, see you there!  
Your feedback on our service would be greatly appreciated.  
I’m free this weekend if you want to catch up.  
Your loan application has been approved!  
Can you remind me to pick up groceries later?  
I'm here if you need to talk about anything.  
The team meeting is set for Wednesday at 10 AM.  
Just finished the book you recommended, it was amazing!  
Your appointment has been confirmed for Friday at 3 PM.  
Let's plan a family BBQ next month!  
Your account balance is low. Please check your transactions.  
I’ll send over the presentation before the end of the day.  
Excited to see you at the concert next week!  
Your feedback is important to us, please fill out this survey.  
I can't make it to the gym today, but I’ll go tomorrow.  
Hope you have a great trip! Safe travels!  
Your warranty expires soon, consider renewing it.  
Looking forward to our game night this Friday!  
The repairs on your car are complete and ready for pickup.  
Just wanted to remind you about the deadline for that report.  
Let’s meet at the park at 3 PM for our run.

Thanks for lending me your book! I really enjoyed it.

Can we reschedule our meeting to next week?  
Your feedback is valuable! Please take a moment to share.
